metadata.name: 8bitvault #1
metadata.description: 8888 8bitvault powering up on the Ethereum blockchain. Each 8bitvault grants you exclusive benefits such as fractionalized NFTs, giveaways, merch, and staking. Each 8bitvault NFT is unique and individually rare. All artwork is 100% provably original and our own, not derived, with custom properties and traits.Visit our awesome community in discord to find out more
